title: (x) Squarish 70s display sans - Neil Bold {Yves}
content:
Hi,

anyone has an idea what this is? Found it in an old comic book.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023083232im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stung_4709.jpg)

thanks!
author: Iznik

comments.content: [Neil Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023083232/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20neil%20bold) pops up regularly on the Type ID Board.
Haha, i didn't know. Apologies, will try to come up with something more difficult next time. Feel free to delete this post.

No no no, no problem. You couldn't know that! ;^)

I just wanted to point out that this is a popular request, and directed you to the other threads where alternatives were suggested. Just being lazy, is all; :^P
